title: Owncast LXC
textContent:
Owncast LXC 
                Owncast is a free and
                    open source live video and web chat server for use with existing popular broadcasting software.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Owncast LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/owncast.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                Owncast Interface: IP:8080 
                    Owncast Admin Interface: IP:8080/admin
                
                ⚙️ Initial Admin Login
                username admin
                password abc123
outerHTML:
Owncast LXC

Owncast is a free and open source live video and web chat server for use with existing popular broadcasting software.

To create a new Proxmox VE Owncast LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/owncast.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 2GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Owncast Interface: IP:8080
Owncast Admin Interface: IP:8080/admin

⚙️ Initial Admin Login

username admin

password abc123
